pre_section_list.text: This Act may be cited as the  Prevention of Crimes (Amendment)  Act, No. 29 of 2017.

Section 2 of the  Prevention of Crimes Ordinance (Chapter 22) (hereinafter referred to as the principal enactment) is hereby amended in sub-paragraph (i) of paragraph ( b ) of subsection (3) thereof, by the substitution for the words and figures, by section 302 of the Criminal Procedure Code, of the words and figures, by section 277 of the Code of Criminal Procedure  Act, No. 15 of 1979.

Section 3 of the principal enactment is hereby amended in subsection (1) thereof, by the substitution for the words and figures under section 325(1) of the Criminal Procedure Code, the Magistrate shall, notwithstanding anything in section 190 of the Criminal Procedure Code, of the words and figures, under section 306 of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act, No.15 of 1979, the Magistrate shall, notwithstanding anything in section 185 of that Act,.
